item.description:
Mortgage loan defaults are still increasing and pre-foreclosure and foreclosure properties represent a huge portion of the market and are the single best source for undervalued real estate for now and in the foreseeable future.

But how do lenders work with troubled real estate?

Find out at Turning the Key where local commercial foreclosure expert Brecht Palombo will share with you who makes the real estate decisions at a bank, how to find and contact them, and how to know which banks to pursue.

Brecht will demonstrate a new online app from that allows the user to "peek behind the curtain" to see the distressed real estate details of more than 8000 lenders nation wide.

We'll explore going direct to lenders to pursue distressed construction, multifamily, commercial and residential real estate opportunities and you will leave with a better understanding of how to go "upstream" to find these deals.

Seating is Limited and pre-registration is HIGHLY recommended!

$30 at the Door • $15 for Pre-Registrations • $10 for Pre-Registered Members • FREE for TTK Pass Holders. Pre-Register Online <-- Here

group.name: Real Estate Networking/Education Meeting in Boston

item.name: Turning the Key Real Estate Networking / Education Meeting February Meetup
